price: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Sesungguhnya aku hanya memberimu peringatan sesuai dengan wahyu." Tetapi orang tuli tidak mendengar seruan apabila mereka diberi peringatan.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
